sentences.en: All she's worried about is whether he is all right.
sentences.cn: 她所担心的只是他是否安然无恙。

sentences.en: Although the car is basically sound, I was worried about certain areas.
sentences.cn: 尽管这辆汽车基本状况良好，我还是担心一些地方不够安全。

sentences.en: Environmentally-conscious Germans are worried about the pollution the car produces.
sentences.cn: 关注环境的德国人对汽车造成的污染十分担心。

sentences.en: He was worried sick about what our mothers would say.
sentences.cn: 对于我们双方的母亲会说什么他十分担心。

sentences.en: He's not at all worried about his car's reliability.
sentences.cn: 对于自己那台车性能的稳定性他根本不担心。

sentences.en: His parents must be worried sick (= extremely worried ) .
sentences.cn: 他的父母肯定担心死了。

sentences.en: I often do absent-minded things, particularly when I'm worried.
sentences.cn: 我常做些心不在焉的事，尤其是在我焦虑不安时。

sentences.en: I was worried I wouldn't be able to hang my washing out.
sentences.cn: 我担心自己没法把洗好的衣服晾出去。

sentences.en: Parisians on the street often looked worried, hurried and unfriendly.
sentences.cn: 巴黎街上的路人往往看上去忧心忡忡、匆匆忙忙而且不太友善。

sentences.en: She gave me a worried look.
Spaniards are worried about German investors deserting Spain for Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人担心德国投资者放弃西班牙而转向东欧。

sentences.en: The majority of us feel worried if we walk through a subway.
sentences.cn: 大多数人在走地下通道时都感到害怕。

sentences.en: They worried about the purity of tap water.
sentences.cn: 他们担心自来水是否纯净。

sentences.en: They worried that German companies would lose business.
sentences.cn: 他们担心德国公司的业务量会下滑。

sentences.en: We were worried that one tiny jolt could worsen her injuries.
sentences.cn: 我们担心稍微颠簸一下就可能会使她的伤势恶化。

sentences.en: We were worried that she was going to die.
sentences.cn: 我们很担心她快要死了。

sentences.en: We worried about his dependency on his mother.
sentences.cn: 我们担心他可能对母亲太过依赖。
